sections.heading: cases; evidence; procedure; ex parte communications
sections.text: In contested cases:(1) An agency may admit and give probative effect to evidence which possesses probative value commonly accepted by reasonably prudent persons in the conduct of their affairs and exclude incompetent, irrelevant, immaterial, and un
